hiveArticle.title: Color Challenge - Monday Red - Big Santa
hiveArticle.body:
Though its little late, but I would like to share Big Santa which arrived Bangalore in the Month of December. The height of it was easily 20 feet or might be more. It was fun watching children's surprised to see that big santa.

![IMG_20171225_154727.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmQiCC3xiehehjnvYPBJjKMdhX5cHgpDu6z7B49Up2Mx5M/IMG_20171225_154727.jpg)![IMG_20171225_154724.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmVnkTPoG69JhGr4CD4xhs4RzfFL6ewDcUmcR6XBDqXwNt/IMG_20171225_154724.jpg)
